Smash up the canarium nuts to make wig (a kind of nalot (\ili{Bislama}), i.e. K.o. pudding), which was to be had with that cabbage (that they had gotten earlier on). All right, so they smashed the canarium nuts (and then started making nalot).'		\hfill{AS.1.028--030}
